title: Sketch 01 - StainedWindow
description: A quick sketch made to test out my trims pipeline. The plan was to spend 2 weeks on it, at the end it took a bit longer. Because of the short timeline I had to make some cuts. If there was more time i'd give it more geo and redo the trim, and maybe push the shape a bit more. smiley --- A big thanks to the Dinusty Discord Community for their feedback and support! :D Everything in the project was created by me --- https://www.petitpalais.paris.fr/le-petit-palais/histoire-du-b%C3%A2timent
